powers: Big Zero has the ability to grow in size, the limits of which are unrevealed, but apparently as her size increases so does her strength and durability
significantissues: First time in action and confronted by Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #1, 2009)
defeated Stature in battle (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #2, 2009) partnered with Stature as part of recruiting session (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #3, 2009)
declined membership into Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #4, 2009)
rematch with Stature and escaped with teammates (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #5, 2009)
